author: Source: Knoxville News Sentinel
title: New York (Ap) - Two police officers involved in the mistaken arrest... - Knoxville News Sentinel
text:
Two police officers involved in the mistaken arrest of James Blake, including one who allegedly tackled the former professional tennis player, will face an administrative trial after the city's police watchdog substantiated Blake's excessive force complaint. Mina Malik, the executive director of the New York City's Civilian Complaint Review Board, said in a letter sent to Blake on Tuesday that investigators had substantiated complaints he made after his Sept.
 Knoxville News Sentinel.
